body:
Hello Belal,


What I usually do for converting from PIC or HDR to JPEG is to use
Radiance's RA_TIFF program (i.e. ra_tiff image.hdr image.tiff), and then
use imagemagick to convert tiff to jpg (convert image.tiff image.jpeg).


Best!


2018-03-01 14:05 GMT+13:00 Belal Abboushi <belal.abboushi at gmail.com>:


> Hi all,
> I am interested in converting evalglare's .pic files to jpeg. I'm assuming
> that I can't save jpeg directly from evalglare? if yes, is there a command
> to convert resultant .pic files to jpeg?
>
> Thank you,
>
> Belal Abboushi
>
> _______________________________________________

Germán Molina
